name: Hallucination
description: Generating plausible but factually incorrect information.

name: Omissions
description: Missing important information in the output.

name: Bias
description: Differences in performance for various population subgroups.

name: Harmful Content
description: Generating content that is harmful or unsafe.

name: Distributional Shift
description: Performance degradation due to changes in data distribution.

name: Adversarial Attacks and Jailbreaks
description: Exploiting vulnerabilities to manipulate model behavior.
